neuro wins: Neuro wins a round of the game
neuro gaslights everyone: Neuro successfully gaslights everyone (this does not include her lying in the game)
neuro throws the game: Neuro throws the game in some way (e.g. saying the actual card she put down)
neuro dies first (in a round): Neuro dies first in a round of the game
neuro roasts anny: Neuro roasts her mother, anny, in some way
neuro believes vedal (rigged): Neuro believes Vedal when he's obviously lying (RIGGED)
